title: How to Make a Foamcore Support Cube

steps.headline: Get your foamcore and cut it into 4 equal sized pieces.
Line one side of each piece of foamcore with silver duct tape.
steps.description: This will provide a way to reflect light if shooting something from the inside of the cube.

steps.headline: Start taping the pieces together.
steps.description: You will be taping them into a cube. Be sure to use the same silver duct tape that you used to line the sides.

steps.headline: Once you have the cube formed, start taping the outside of it.
steps.description: If you want to make a multi-use cube, use different colors. This cube has black, silver, and gold for three sides. A suggestion for the third side would be white non-reflective white tape or something else white that you will be able to use in your photography.

text: Get your foamcore and cut it into 4 equal sized pieces.  Line one side of each piece of foamcore with silver duct tape. This will provide a way to reflect light if shooting something from the inside of the cube. Start taping the pieces together. You will be taping them into a cube. Be sure to use the same silver duct tape that you used to line the sides. Once you have the cube formed, start taping the outside of it. If you want to make a multi-use cube, use different colors. This cube has black, silver, and gold for three sides. A suggestion for the third side would be white non-reflective white tape or something else white that you will be able to use in your photography.
